field.name: SWRST
field.description: Software reset. Set automatically; write 1 to clear

field.name: WDRST
field.description: Watchdog timeout. Set automatically; write 1 to clear

field.name: EXTRST
field.description: External reset. Set automatically; write 1 to clear

field.name: POR
field.description: Power-on reset. Set automatically; write 1 to clear

field.name: EVENTEN
field.description: Enable time capture of an event

field.name: RLD
field.description: Timer reload on write to clear register

field.name: ALOAD
field.description: Value updated in the timer clock domain

field.name: PDOK
field.description: GPTCLRI[0] is updated in the timer clock domain

field.name: BUSY
field.description: Timer busy. Check after writing GPTCON.

field.name: EVENT
field.description: Event select range. Timer event select range (0 to 15).

register.name: PWRKEY
register.description: Key protection for the PWRMOD register.

register.name: OSCKEY
register.description: Write 0xCB14 to unlock the OSCCTRL register

register.name: GP0PE
register.description: GPIO Port 0 pin pull enable. Enable the pull up / pull down for the corresponding pin.

register.name: GP0POL
register.description: GPIO Port 0 Interrupt polarity; clear: high->low; set: low->high

register.name: GP0INT
register.description: GPIO Port 0 Interrupt status. Indicates if rising/falling edge has been detected. Write 1 to clear.

register.name: CLKCON0
register.description: configure clock sources for various systems

field.name: USBCTLCLKDIVMUX
field.description: USB control clock divider mux select

field.name: USBCTLCLKDIVMUX
field.description: USB control clock divider mux select

field.name: CTCLKOFF
field.description: CTCLK user control. This bit disables the CTCLK.

field.name: ACLKOFF
field.description: ACLK user control. This bit disables the ACLK and AFE_ADC_CLK.

field.name: HFXTALNOK
field.description: HF crystal not stable. Successfully disabled.

field.name: HFXTALOK
field.description: HF crystal stable. Sticky bit. Write 1 to clear; use for interrupt.

field.name: LFXTALNOK
field.description: LF crystal not stable. Successfully disabled.

field.name: LFXTALOK
field.description: LF crystal stable. Sticky bit. Write 1 to clear; use for interrupt.

field.name: UPLLUNLOCK
field.description: USB PLL unlock. Is set when PLL loses its lock (sticky), write 1 to clear

field.name: UPLLLOCK
field.description: USB PLL lock. Is set when PLL locks (sticky), write 1 to clear

field.name: SPLLUNLOCK
field.description: System PLL unlock. Is set when SPLL loses its lock (sticky), write 1 to clear

field.name: SPLLLOCK
field.description: System PLL lock. Is set when SPLL locks (sticky), write 1 to clear

field.name: STOPINC
field.description: Stop wake up field A being updated

field.name: SIGNERR
field.description: Info space signature check on reset error

register.name: FEEAEN0
register.description: Lower 16 bits of the sys irq abort enable register.

register.name: FEEAEN1
register.description: Upper 16 bits of the sys irq abort enable register.

register.name: FEEAEN2
register.description: Upper 32..47 bits of the sys irq abort enable register.

field.name: MSTOP
field.description: STOP driven by th eI2C master

field.name: NACKDATA
field.description: Ack not received in response to data write

field.name: NACKADDR
field.description: Ack not received in response to an address

register.name: I2CSSTA
register.description: "Slave I2C Status, Error and IRQ Register"

field.name: STOP
field.description: Stop after start and matching address

field.name: NOACK
field.description: Ack not generated by the slave

field.name: TXFSEREQ
field.description: Tx FIFO status or early request

register.name: I2CFSTA
register.description: Master and Slave Rx/Tx FIFO Status Register

field.name: RXS
field.description: Set when there are more bytes in the RX FIFO than the TIM bit says

field.name: RX
field.description: Set when a receive interrupt occurs

field.name: TX
field.description: Set when a transmit interrupt occurs

field.name: DIV
field.description: Factor used to divide UCLK to generate the serial clock

enumeratedValue.name: RXRD
enumeratedValue.description: - Cleared by user to initiate transfer with a read of the SPIRX register

enumeratedValue.name: TXWR
enumeratedValue.description: - Set by user to initiate transfer with a write to the SPITX register.

field.name: RXS
field.description: Set when there are more bytes in the RX FIFO than the TIM bit says

field.name: RX
field.description: Set when a receive interrupt occurs

field.name: TX
field.description: Set when a transmit interrupt occurs

field.name: DIV
field.description: Factor used to divide UCLK to generate the serial clock

enumeratedValue.name: RXRD
enumeratedValue.description: - Cleared by user to initiate transfer with a read of the SPIRX register

enumeratedValue.name: TXWR
enumeratedValue.description: - Set by user to initiate transfer with a write to the SPITX register.

field.name: EDMAR
field.description: Enable DMA requests in transmit mode

field.name: EDMAT
field.description: Enable DMA requests in receive mode

enumeratedValue.name: RXBUFFULL
enumeratedValue.description: - Receive buffer full interrupt. Read RBR register to clear.

enumeratedValue.name: RXLINESTATUS
enumeratedValue.description: - Receive line status interrupt. Read LSR register to clear.

field.name: TEMT
field.description: COMTX and Shift Register Empty Status Bit.

register.name: GP1PE
register.description: GPIO Port 1 output pull-up / pull-down enable.

register.name: GP1IEN
register.description: GPIO Port 1 input path enable. Each bit is set to enable and cleared to disable the input path for the GPIO pin

register.name: GP1IENA
register.description: GPIO Port 1 Interrupt A enable register.

register.name: GP1IENB
register.description: GPIO Port 1 Interrupt B enable register.

register.name: GP2PUL
register.description: GPIO Port 2 output pull up enable.
